pr_title: GeneratedResourceBuildItem may also be filtered and ignoredEntries from plugins is now used

timeline.bodyText: Aren't we supporting ignored entries only for the uber jar packaging?
timeline.author: aloubyansky

replies.bodyText: Yes, I added support for thin JARs too (when the resource is inside the project). This may be useful for files that should be ignored while creating the JAR
replies.author: gastaldi

timeline.message:
GeneratedResourceBuildItem may also be filtered

This checks if the GeneratedResourceBuildItem isn't listed as an ignored entry
Fixes #10406

ignoredEntries from plugins is now used

Add Maven tests
